data.persona: My occupation is really boring most of the time. I always have to be on the lookout though. I have to be prepared to handle the unexpected.
data.description:
You are in the Iconostasis.
Iconostasis is a small stand with icons right outside the church. It has 5 different handmade icons. The stand is decorated with golden roses and white linen
There's a silver incense burner, a priceless painting, a hanging religious carving, and a wooden kneeler carved from oak here.
A boy is here.

You are carrying a candy, and wearing a guard's armor.

data.short_motivation: I will eat some of the candy that I just offered to the boy, to convince him that it isn't poisoned.
data.mid_motivation: I will win the boy's trust with the candy and then question him about the icon thefts that the priest asked me to investigate.
data.long_motivation: I will catch the blackguard that would steal from a church, and hopefully see him burned as a heretic.
